subject: Advertising and Marketing
Adultery
lead_paragraph: As Tiger Woods remains hidden from public view in his home, or somewhere else, he has begun to fade from view in his role as ubiquitous corporate pitchman for an array of products.
snippet: As Tiger Woods remains hidden from public view in his home, or somewhere else, he has begun to fade from view in his role as ubiquitous corporate pitchman for an array of products.
